exam.title: Amazon SDE-1 Recruitment Mock
exam.description: Complete simulation of the OA with Leadership Principles and DSA.

questions.text: A customer is angry about a delayed package. According to Leadership Principles, what is the best first step?
options: Apologize and provide an immediate workaround
Wait for the system to update
Tell the customer it is not your fault
questions.correctAnswer: Apologize and provide an immediate workaround
questions.explanation: Customer Obsession is the primary principle.
questions.subject: Leadership Principles
